001package imagingbook.pub.morphology;
002
003import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
004
005public class BinaryErosion extends BinaryMorphologyFilter {
006        
007        public BinaryErosion() {
008                super();
009        }
010        
011        public BinaryErosion(byte[][] H) {
012                super(H);
013        }
014
015        @Override
016        public void applyTo(ByteProcessor ip) {
017                // dilates the background
018                ip.invert();
019                new BinaryDilation(reflect(H)).applyTo(ip); //dilate(ip, reflect(H));
020                ip.invert();
021        }
022
023}
